review: Earlier today, Apple unveiled two iPhone 6 models at its Special Event in Flint Center, Cupertino.The first device, the iPhone 6 comes with a 4.7-inch display and the second, the iPhone 6 Plus, comes with a 5.5-inch display.The iPhone 6 Plus has a 5.5-inch Retina HD display, with a pixel density of 401ppi and a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels.But there’s a lot more to the iPhone 6 Plus than just its screen.Here’s the full spec sheet of the iPhone 6 Plus.
